item.title: calling all Instagram experts! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! We're looking for a talented Social Media Content Creator to create engaging content for our new brand-Instagram account.

We are a new health/wellness startup and make a wearable device that reduces nasal congestion caused by allergies.

We have photos and and some video assets ready for you to use - but will expect you to be able to edit and craft these assets into suitable post formats (i.e. not just simply crop into post-able form what we give you). You'll need to be up-to-date with the latest Instagram trends, be able to create posts that drive engagement, and know how to use Instagram's latest features effectively to drive as much interaction and shares as possible.

The job is ongoing, but we'll start with a short trial - with preference given to folks who are able to execute and have a first batch of content back to us within 24 hours.

Bonus: experience with growing an audience on twitter is also a plus

Hourly Range: $9.00-$28.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:56 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Influencer Marketing, Instagram Story, UGC, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Management
Skills: Influencer Marketing, Instagram Story, UGC, Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Social Media Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Editor Required - Upwork
item.description:
I'm the creator of a YouTube channel focused on entertainment and history content. I'm in need of a skilled editor to help me craft engaging videos for my audience.

Key Responsibilities:
- Edit Weekly Videos: I upload content to my channel twice a week, and you'll be responsible for editing these videos.
- Engage the Audience: You'll need to have a good sense of pacing and presentation, ensuring that the videos are engaging and keep viewers watching until the end.
- Enhance the Visuals: While I focus on the content, I need someone with an eye for visual appeal to enhance the quality of the videos.

Ideal Skills and Experience:
- Video Editing: Proficiency in editing tools and techniques is a must.
- Understanding of YouTube: Knowledge of YouTube trends and algorithms will be a big plus.
- Creative Flair: Ability to add creative elements to the videos to make them stand out.
- Punctuality: Meeting weekly deadlines is crucial.


Reference videos :

https://youtu.be/zUHAzg5QeLM?si=M5A4ZBeSWlyynsuV

https://youtu.be/SkS9QxI-oq8?si=ZXPELUeICX88kHiP

https://youtu.be/n8k9eYfggZY?si=iU2I4_9Ky4l3NiiF

https://youtu.be/7zT7LnOvXRs?si=uopayeaWnQ4J3Woe

https://youtu.be/BbHCNUNGpRY?si=5Y5bWVo3HY0kP_Gi

If you have a passion for editing and a creative mindset, I'd love to hear from you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Marketer - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a talented Social Media Marketer to administer our social media accounts. You will be responsible for creating original text and video content, managing posts, and responding to followers. You will manage our company image in a cohesive way to achieve our marketing goals.

As a Social Media Marketer, we expect you to be up-to-date with the latest digital technologies and social media trends. You should have excellent communication skills and be able to express our company’s views creatively.

Key Responsibilities:
Develop, implement, and manage our social media strategy
Define the most important social media KPIs
Manage and oversee social media content
Measure the success of every social media campaign
Stay up to date with the latest social media best practices and technologies
Provide constructive feedback
Daily and Monthly Responsibilities:
Design and implement social media strategy to align with business goals and branding.
Generate, edit, publish, and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos, and news)
Monitor SEO and web traffic metrics
Collaborate with other teams, like marketing, sales, and customer service to ensure brand consistency
Communicate with followers, respond to queries in a timely manner, and monitor customer reviews

Oversee social media accounts’ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures, and blog layout)
Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions
Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, design tools, and applications

Requirements and Skills:
Proven work experience as a Social Media Marketer or similar role
Hands-on experience in content management
Excellent copywriting skills
Ability to deliver creative content (text, image, and video)
Solid knowledge of SEO, keyword research, and Google Analytics
Knowledge of online marketing channels
Familiarity with web design
Excellent communication skills
Analytical and multitasking skills

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with social media analytics and reporting tools
Strong understanding of social media algorithms and trends
Experience with graphic design tools like Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, etc.

This can be a long-term positon if we find the right expert.  We look forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:26 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, Nextdoor, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: TikTok, Nextdoor, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Content Creation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Reel Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a talented individual who can create engaging and captivating Instagram reel videos. As an Instagram Reel Video Creator, you will be responsible for editing short videos that align with our brand aesthetic and target audience. The ideal candidate should have a keen eye for visual storytelling, strong video editing skills, and a deep understanding of the Instagram platform.

Skills required:
-Making engaging Instagram reels
- Experience with Google Drive to download and upload video content
- Creative thinking and storytelling abilities
- Strong understanding of Instagram trends and features
- Attention to detail
- Ability to meet deadlines

Your job will be to go on Infinite.Aesthetics Instagram, look at the reels and understand the latest Instagram trends in order to create reels from raw videos into finished edited reels ready to post.

You will go on google drive to get videos you can use in the reels, then edit them on Instagram or whatever platform you wish, and then upload finished videos into a seperate folder.

ONLY if you have looked at Infinite.Aesthetics Instagram, have experience making reels and using google drive, then apply for this role.

This can be an ongoing project depending on the quality of reels produced, as well as initiate shown to make them better and come back with trend suggestions.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 04:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Videography
Country: New Zealand
click to apply
